description:
___
###[choco://windows-sandbox](choco://windows-sandbox)
To use choco:// protocol URLs, install [(unofficial) choco:// Protocol support ](https://chocolatey.org/packages/choco-protocol-support)
___

###Windows Sandbox is a new lightweight desktop environment tailored for safely running applications in isolation.

NOTE: The version is Chocolatey package related only. Windows Sandbox version corresponds with your Windows build version. The actual version of Windows Sandbox will depend on your version of Windows.

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/windows-sandbox/readme.md)**
	

___

Click here to [Patreon-ize](https://www.patreon.com/bcurran3) the package maintainer.
___
author: Microsoft
